climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: WIDE & THICK CUSHION - This office swivel chair has a high-density foam cushion on the seat and backrest, which is not only comfortable, but also has excellent flexibility. The seat surface is covered by PU leather and the vertical grain design ensures air circulation, so you won't feel stuffy or sweaty even after sitting for a long time.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL DESIGN FOR SMALL SPACES - This compact low-back cute computer desk chair is designed to be flexible and maximize the functionality of your workspace. Its 360° swivel feature allows for unrestricted movement, making it easy to maneuver in tight spaces. The height-adjustable feature makes it perfect for a variety of settings, whether it's a bedroom, study, nail salon or dressing room.

COMPACT AND STRONG - This armless office chair is built to last with a sturdy base and U-shaped lumbar support system. It has a maximum weight capacity of 250 pounds, ensuring stability and durability for all users. The upgraded SGS-certified cylinders provide added safety and reliability. In addition, this office chair is BIFMA certified and rigorously tested to provide you with maximum safety.

HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE & 360° SWIVEL-Adjustable height PU leather office chair to your specific needs with the height adjustable function, allowing you to customize the height between 17.71" and 21.45", ensuring a perfect fit for any desk. The smooth casters ensure effortless mobility, gliding quietly and seamlessly on any type of flooring, without leaving any marks or scratches.

QUICK AND EASY ASSEMBLY - With our installation video and manual, you can easily experience the assembly process. With the new upgraded tools, it only takes 5-10 minutes and you are ready to use the chair. If you have any questions or concerns, our professional customer service team will quickly provide you with a satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: good , came packaged in box and wrapped in plastic ,seat is good foam and back rest is not flimsy ,it is easy to put together with supplied tool and bolts ,also has a few spare bolts incase you loose one . i will say it rolls nice and seems to be good quality ,its not as big and cumbersome as my office desk and thats what i was looking for ,i would recommend if your looking for a nice chair ,and the price is good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We couldn't be more pleased with this chair. I is very comfortable and well made. Assembly was easy, and they even included a tool to do it with. The quality of the chair is super. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-Quality Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair exceeded my expectations. The frame and legs are sturdy; it appears they are made of steel. The chair seat and back are extremely comfortable. It will be easy to keep clean with a damp cloth. The instructions were simple and concise. The only help I needed was pushing the castor wheels onto the legs, which my husband did very easily. This was a great price for the quality of the chair. No tools were needed for assembly; a sturdy Allen wrench was included with extra hardware. I highly recommend this chair. I am very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall great chair for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is well-made and has easy-to-read assembly instructions. The cushions are soft and the chair is sturdy. I didn't give it a 5-star review because the color is not white, more of a cream. I was expecting and wanted white like the product pictures, but the cream will have to do. If you want a true white this chair isn't for you. I placed the white paper on the chair to show the color difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, smaller chair
reviews.reviewText: I needed a smaller chair for my office that I could use to scoot between my work and personal desks and this fit the bill perfectly. It's small, but comfortable and fits under a desk nicely. It took about 15 minutes to assemble and the instructions were simple and clear. The allen wrench tool supplied is quite nice with a large comfortable handle so you can get some nice torque in the screws. The manufacturer also supplied a couple of extra parts, just in case! I'm very satisfied with this chair at an excellent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beyond exceeding expectations!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair mostly for its color; I love the orange hue of the brown and have two other chairs that look similar, a bit bigger, and 2x the price. This chair is half the price of my previous and it is more comfortable, more durable, has smoother rolling, more padding, and much higher quality fabric. I love this chair so much; as soon as I sit down on it, I feel all the pressure on my bottom go away.I sew for hours straight and I get up feeling so much better than any other chair I've used to work with before. The back rest meets perfectly to the center of my back (I'm 5'4) and feels secure and comfortable when I lean back in it. My husband is also around 260lbs and 6'4 and feels just as comfortable in the chair as I do. If you need this chair for the weight capacity, I think it definitely carries quite a bit more than 300lbs.I didn't check the size of the chair before buying but the size is much shorter than a typical desk chair and fits perfectly in my small cubby desk. So this chair will save you a lot of space and pain in the a**!Finally, the assembly was so incredibly easy and of all at-home-assembled furniture I've bought, the allen-key wrench is also the best I've ever used. It makes it so easy to turn the screws and doesn't hurt your hurts like many others.I wish I had bought these chairs instead of my previous; if you were thinking of buying this, here is your confirmation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, good quality, looks great, and inexpensive. The cost of office chairs can be so expensive, but not this one. I was pleasantly surprised by how easy it is to put together and how sturdy the frame is. Exactly what I wanted and needed. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm 71 years old and I assembled 2 chairs in an hour and a 1/4. All parts were there and the directions were easy to follow. The seats are wide and seem comfortable for my small office. They are also lightweight and roll around easily.
